subsection.name: 1. Overview
subsection.p: FnCalendar is a function hub class containing a lot of static methods to work with Calendar objects. Those static methods return functions that take a Calendar object as its input or output (depending on the function). It includes conversions to String, to Calendar and adding days to a Calendar among others.
